author: NA
title: More Brits prefer online shopping since pandemic - Reuters
description: About 70% of Britons say buying online and on mobile phones have become their preferred shopping methods, up from less than half prior to the coronavirus pandemic, according to a study by personal finance startup Credit Karma.

title: 3 Pandemic-Fueled Commerce Trends Poised to Yield Long-Term Growth for Businesses
description: Brands tapped text-based shopping, experiential loyalty programs and online marketplaces to drive newfound sales amid the crisis - strategies that look to stick.

title: More than 8,700 chain stores have closed in 2021, analysis shows

author: Andrew J. Hawkins
title: Ford, Argo, and Walmart are bringing robo-delivery to three US cities
description: Ford and Argo will test out an autonomous delivery service with Walmart in three US cities: Miami, Austin, and Washington, DC. Testing will start this year.

description:

description: The acquisition is positioned to bolster the firm's consumer business and offer new products and new ways to attract consumers to its Marcus by Goldman Sachs brand of finance products.
